lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Continued heavy rains in the northern coastal area, flooding of several major rivers and mud slides have led to increased concern, the report, dated March 17, said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: There are heightened fears that "El Nino" may be returning to Peru with an intensity approaching the 1983 disaster, which affected the weather on several continents and caused widespread damage through floods and drought, the U.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: It said there is still the outside chance that El Nino will intensify and carry on through late March, April and May causing problems as crops approach harvest.
